node.title: Window of Opportunity
node.description: A window of opportunity exists whenever someone is willing to listen to what we want to share. How do we maximize that opportunity? Marketers seek to engage us for 15 minutes to save us 15 percent, where God uses windows of opportunity to save souls. The next 15 minutes could be our last opportunity. How can we best utilize that limited time? From his own experience, Todd will tell the story of such a window of opportunity.
